description: A great piece of open source software for analysing AFM images. I would definitely recommend this app to anyone working with AFM images.

The "standard" application for atomic force microscopy; relatively simple to use, and has all the features I need to perform AFM analysis. 

This version was not compiled with 3-D outputs (as of May 2020). The flatpak is also configured without a portal for filesystem read/write permissions, so a user might want to override with the command "flatpak override --filesystem=home net.gwyddion.Gwyddion" to give home directory access or filesystem=host for more access.
summary: Great app for analysis of AFM data

description: Spent a while being extremely confused as to why Gwyddion refused to see any of my files, had to download Flatseal to give it permission to access them for some reason. Otherwise it would be perfect.
summary: Wonderful software but had to set permissions manually

description: Its very simple and complete, thank you.
